activities:
Portfolio Recovery Associates, Inc. (PRA) is a specialized financial and business services company. PRA, through its subsidiaries, is a  market leader in the consumer debt purchase and collection industry, and provides a broad range of fee-based services, including revenue enhancement for local governments; vehicle location, skip-tracing and collateral recovery for auto lenders, governments, and law enforcement; contingent consumer debt recovery on behalf of banks, credit providers, and debt purchasers; and filing of class action claims on behalf of institutional investors, manufacturers, and retailers. 

PRA would use personal information received from EEA in furtherance of the above-referenced business activities.
personaldata: Organization, employee, client and customer data, including but not limited to manually processed and online data.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities for organization human resources data; BBB EU Safe Harbor Program for all other data
